alert.note: Alert for Grundy; Linn; Livingston (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 10:53PM CDT until August 11 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN LINN...SOUTH CENTRAL GRUNDY AND NORTHEASTERN LIVINGSTON COUNTIES... At 1053 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northwest of Wheeling, or 9 miles northeast of Chillicothe, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Chillicothe, Meadville, Wheeling and Chula. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
